Row.Text: RESOURCES:
Greetings, great leader. We represent [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We hope that we can forge a strong and lasting peace with your mighty empire.
Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We have been awaiting a strong ally like you for a long time!
Pleased to meet you. Welcome to the benevolent state of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We look forward to sharing our knowledge with you.
Hallelujah! We have heard about your mighty empire in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Make yourself at home.
Greetings from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We look forward to creating a strong partnership with your people!
Come in! We have heard many stories about you. We are glad you visited [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Nice to see such a mighty ruler in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We hope you have big plans for us!
Greetings. We are the people of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Treat us fairly and we shall have peace.
Hello passerby. You have entered the territory of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We do not want any trouble.
Good day. The nation of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] welcomes new acquaintances. Be kind and we will be happy to return the favor.
Greetings, stranger. What are you looking for in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Hello! We did not expect any guests in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. What we can do for you?
Welcome! We can see you are very tired after the long journey to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Can we do something for you?
Greetings, traveler. How did you find [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]? We have avoided outside contact so far.
Halt, Stranger! We are the mighty people of [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Trifle with us at your own peril!
Careful! Do not try to start a war with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We know how to defend our people!
Don't move, stranger! We heard many stories about your kind in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]!
Mhmmm, so you say that you want to be friends with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], huh? That's very nice of you, but we don't trust strangers!
What a coincidence! Our fortune-teller foresaw the coming of the end of the world. Is this your purpose in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Well, well. We think you have no interest in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Oh, gods! That's just what we needed! A bloodthirsty tyrant in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Different cultures can always benefit from each other.
Please, get to know our culture. It's important to us.
We can start a cultural revolution in your country!
We are interested in exchanging some cultural artifacts. Do you have some?
Every culture is interesting. We want to know more about yours, too.
Strong culture is the key to victory! And you do want to conquest the world, right?
We want you to adopt our culture. Are you ok with that?
We have great military knowledge. We can increase the strength of your army.
Glorious battles are our way of life!
We can train special units for you. Come and check them out!
We studied the art of war. We can teach you some unique techniques.
How about we start a war?
We heard you trained the greatest army in the world. We kind of like it.
Sometimes, war is pointless. But sometimes, it's the only option.
We can help accelerate your civilization's growth.
We can provide enough food to feed your people.
We can see that your people are starving! We can help them.
We had good harvests this year, and we can share some resources with you.
Do you want to look at our food reserves?
We like exchanging things. We can provide you as much food as you want.
Check our fruits! Taste our vegetables! Smell our fish! Enjoy our spices!
We have many luxuries that can make your citizens happy.
Our riches can shame any mighty leader.
If you are looking for luxuries, then you came to the right place!
We have enough gold to make anyone happy. Even a leader like you!
Luxuries, luxuries, and once more, luxuries! That's the key to co-existence.
The only thing that makes people happy is money. Anyone who denies that is a fool.
Our guilds, banks, mints, and markets make dreams possible. What are your dreams?
We can help nurture your religious traditions.
Pray in our temples, and maybe the gods will forgive your sins!
If you are looking for forgiveness, then you came to the right place. Pray and repent.
Our sacred places are open for your people and anyone else who wants to pray.
We can speak with the gods! Remember that!
We are the religious capital of the world. Anyone who denies that is a heretic and must be burned at the stake!
Are you here to confess your sins?
We amassed some gold in our treasury. {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold for you from our nation.
Everyone needs money! Take this {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold and go!
This {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold should help you.
Please, use this {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold wisely!
Don't forget to take {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold!
We want to gift you {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.
We are in a good mood. {1_Value} [ICON_GOLD] Gold for you!
We want to give you a piece of treasured art worth {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture.
Our cultural artifacts will be a nice addition to your empire. We lay {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture onto your hands.
{1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture is everything we have right now in our museums.
Admire our art! This {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture is yours now.
We sculpted {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for you. Present it to your people!
We have some spare {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for you.
This {1_Value} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture should change your attitude toward us.
Take this cart filled with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food to boost your developement.
These containers with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food are for your people. Feed them.
Fresh {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food from our market is available for you.
Do you like local meals? {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food is prepared for you to taste.
Maybe this {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food will strengthen our relationship?
We've transported containers with {1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food to your civilization.
{1_Value} [ICON_FOOD] Food is at your disposal. Share it with your people!
Our religious artifacts are worth {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Take them, please.
The gods have sent you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith!
Our prophets pleased the gods, and they sent you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
Please, take this sacred cross worth {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
We see a dim future for your civilization. Maybe this {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith will help guide you toward enlightenment.
The gods decided to send you {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith. Appreciate their kindness!
We put in a word for you. The gods listened and transferred {1_Value} [ICON_PEACE] Faith.
We trained a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR] for you. Use his abilities wisely.
A [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR] from our camp wants to join you. He is ready for your orders now.
A fresh recruit for you: a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR].
What about hiring one of our best [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}s[ENDCOLOR]?
We want to join your coalition. Take this [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR]. We would like to show you our devotion!
[COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}s[ENDCOLOR] can be very useful. We prepared one for you.
We heard you need a [COLOR_CYAN]{1_Value}[ENDCOLOR]. We can provide you with one!
Welcome! Your appearance in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] amazed us! Become our friend, please!
We are pleased to meet you! Unfortunately, we did not expect anybody in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], and we have nothing prepared as a gift. Forgive us!
Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]!
Greetings, mighty leader. You are in the best place in the world - [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. It's a shame we cannot give you anything.
What a wonderful day! Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! You should have announced your arrival. We weren't prepared.
Praise the day! Welcome to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We would have made some preparations, if only we knew...
Praise the gods! We doubted anyone would ever arrive to [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. We spent everything we had to survive those harsh times.
What a surprise! We're sincerely sorry we cannot give you anything. Please, feel welcome in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Greetings. We have nothing for you. Walk away from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Hi. Friendship with [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] is all you can afford for now. Appreciate it!
Hello. You entered [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Be careful, we do not want any trouble.
Hi! You have nothing for [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], so we have nothing for you, either!
Good day. What are you looking for in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
How do you do? Do you like [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
How are you doing? Travel through [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR], and we will change your attitude toward our nation.
Good morning, stranger. We want to tell you that [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] is not eager to be involved in any conflict.
Hi. Don't think you get anything from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR].
Halt! Turn away from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! We won't give you anything!
Don't move! You are trespassing in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]! Turn around and go away!
Huh, another usurper. What do you want from [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]?
Well, well! Do you expect [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR] to kneel before you?
Two steps back! We have orders to kill anyone approaching [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. Do you want to die?
Who are you? We did not expect anyone in [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]. It would be better if you go away.
Who told you about [COLOR_CYAN]{1_civ}[ENDCOLOR]? We will kill them!
Just nothing.
Here comes our protector! May the gods will be with you!
Greetings, our saviour! What we can do for your nation?
Hello, our friend! Everything alright with our agreement?
Welcome again, mighty ruler! We are happy to see you so powerful!
The gods have sent you to us! We are safe now!
Welcome again! Long time no see. Do you want to continue our agreement?
Greetings! It's been a while since you offered your protection. Our people are frightened by local neighbours!
Good to see you again! We have peace and prosperity under your wings!
Hello again, protector! We have thought about a wider coalition with our neighbours. You could visit them, too.
Ha! We knew you would come soon! And no one believed us. Your protection saves our lives!
We're happy to see you again! What we can do for you?
Hello again! What brings you to us?
Greetings! We hope that our relationship is in its best condition. Can we do something for you?
Good to see you! Do you want to talk?
What a coincidence! We wanted to talk with you.
Long time no see. Have you managed to fulfill our requests?
Hello, how are you? Today is a good day to talk.
Nice to see you! Do you want something to eat? You seem exhausted. Tell us what happened.
Goodness, you look like a ghost! What happened? Can we help you somehow?
Brothers and sisters, we welcome you again! What do you need?
Hello. What brought you here again?
Good day, wise ruler. Do you want something from us?
Hello again. We do not want any trouble. What brings you to our city?
Hello. We do what we must. Do you?
Greetings. What brings such a mighty ruler to our city?
Hi. I suppose you need something, again...
Greetings. After your latest deeds, we are not sure we want to cooperate with you. This may bring more trouble to us!
Huh, you again. Our neighbours do not trust you. Why should we?
Good morning. How are you? Your presence here is questioned. What do you want from us this time?
Oh, my lord. I thought we understood each other last time. Do we need to explain everything to you again?
Arghh, it's you again! We hoped we would never see you again.
Oh, it's you. Don't forget our relationship hasn't changed since our last meeting.
Well, well. Do you need something from us? Again?
Huh! You want some help from us? Forget it!
Stop! We warned you once! Next time, we will kill you!
Warning! You are stepping into a restricted area! Identify yourself!
You are not welcome here! What do you want?
We've been building an army to protect our people from you.
Don't move! We told you to not to show yourself here!
We thought we could work together. How wrong we were! Begone!
